html:div.html:h5: Let us follow these simple tips & a power greener world !

html:div.html:p: Demand Side Management (DSM) refers to cooperative activities between the utility and its customers (sometimes with the assistance of third parties such as energy services companies and various trade allies) to implement options for increasing the efficiency of energy utilisation, with resulting benefits to the customer, utility and society as a whole.
Benefits of the DSM initiatives are manifold, some of which are described below:
Satisfy electricity demands, Reduce / stabilise costs (bills), Improve value of service, Maintain/improve lifestyle and productivity
Reduce environmental degradation, Conserve resources, Protect global environment, Maximise customer welfare
Lower cost of service, Improved operating efficiency, flexibility, Reduce capital needs, Improve customer service
The implementation of DSM programmes in India is likely to:

html:ul.html:li: Improve the efficiency of energy systems.
Reduce financial needs to build new energy facilities (generation).
Minimise adverse environmental impacts.
Lower the cost of delivered energy to consumers.
Reduce power shortages and power cuts.
Improve the reliability and quality of power supply.

html:div.html:p: DSM programmes are utility and customer specific. Figure below describes various steps involved in implementing a DSM initiative.

This stage in the DSM implementation will typically assess the customer base, tariff, load profile on an hourly basis and will identify the sectors contributing to the load shape. This step will also identify peak load contributors.

Based on the results of the load research in the utility, DSM teams define the load shape objectives for the current situation. Various load-shape objectives - Peak Clipping (reduction in the peak demand), Valley Filling (increased demand at off-peak), Load Shifting (demand shifting to non-peak period), and Load Building (increased demand) are possible. These are represented in figure below.

html:h5.html:strong: Specific descriptions of load-shape objectives are shown in adjacent Box.

html:div.html:div: the reduction of utility load primarily during periods of peak demand
the improvement of system load factor by building load in off-peak periods
the reduction of utility loads during periods of peak demand, while at the same time building load in off-peak periods. Load shifting typically does not substantially alter total electricity sales.
the reduction of utility loads, more or less equally, during all or most hours of the day.
the increase of utility loads, more or less equally, during all or most hours of the day.
refers to programmes that set up utility options to alter customer energy consumption on an as-needed basis, as in interruptible/ curtailable agreements.

html:div.html:p: This step will identify the end-use applications that can be potentially targeted to reduce peak demand, specifically in sectors contributing to system peak. This step will also carry out a detailed benefit-cost analysis for the end-users and the utilities, including analysis of societal as well as environmental benefits.

Implementation stage includes programme design for specific end-use applications, promotes the programme to the target audience through marketing approaches such as advertising, bills and inserts, and focused group meetings (specifically in case of commercial and industrial sector).

This step tracks the programme design and implementation and compares the same with proposed DSM goal set by the utility. A detailed benefit-cost analysis in this case includes identifying the avoided supply cost for the utility vis-ï¿½-vis the total programme cost for the utilities and benefits to the participants including the reduced bills or incentives to the end-users.

html:div.html:p: Every 3000 sheets of paper cost us a tree. At this rate, it won't be long that all trees will completely disappear. So let's do what it takes to preserve the environment. Help save trees by registering for e-bill and get your bills in your inbox instead of regular hard copies.
FILL YOUR DETAILS BELOW TO REGISTER FOR E-BILL

RadioButton.text: I agree to save trees and contribute toward nature by opening for e-bill and stop reciving paper bills

Text.text: *Incentive would be credited in the bill at the rate of 1% of bill amount (excl taxes) of the last generated bill up to a maximum of Rs.50/-. * This is a onetime incentive for first time registartion only.

Panel.html:h5: Apply for Solar Roof Top Net Metering
Panel.html:h6: To Apply For Solar Net metering Click on "Apply"
If you have Already applied and want to upload documents

html:ol.html:li: Confirm your consumer number for which you want to apply for Roof Top Solar Net Metering.
Fill the online application form. All fields marked with * are mandatory.
You can save the filled in application form in "Draft" mode and modify it later. To save the form in draft mode click on "Save In Draft".
If you have filled the entire form correctly and want to save, take print out of the form and "upload" require documents click on "Final Save & Continue".
Download the Filled-in application form (PDF Format). Take prtint out of the downloaded form. Authorized signatory should sign the form at the required places.
Upload all necessary documents along with application form. List of necessary documents click on "Document List".
Ensure that single PDF is attached for each document.
After uploadig all the documents click on "Submit", to complete the online application process.
We will reply you on your registered E-Mail ID for further Net Metering process.
If you have any query, please write to "solarnetmetering@tatapower.com"

How often do you visit our website

html:div.html:p: Select your tariff category and enter your energy consumption to help us calculate your bill. If you desire to calculate your energy consumption, please
Please Note: The billing amount generated is an estimated amount based on the type of customer selected by you. Your actual bill amount may vary from this amount.
Welcome to Tata Power Consumer Care Portal. We at Tata Power, have been constantly striving to innovate and provide services to exceed Consumer expectations.

Through this portal, we are attempting to reach out to all our Consumers who will find it convenient to seek information and do meaningful transactions. The design and content of this portal has been done keeping Consumers’ convenience and needs in mind. We hope you find it a worthwhile experience and the navigation user friendly.
Please get yourself registered at once and experience the difference!
We value your suggestions. So, do not hesitate to give your candid feedback ! We look forward to hearing from you!

Recognised as India’s largest private sector power utility, with a reputation for trustworthiness, built up over nearly nine decades, Tata Power surges ahead into yet another year with plans of sustained growth, greater value to consumer and reliable power supply.

Led by a powerful vision, Tata Power pioneered the generation of electricity in India. It has now successfully served the Mumbai consumers for over ninety years and has spread its footprints across the nation. Today, it is the country’s largest private player in the sector. Apart from Mumbai and Delhi, the company has generation capacities in Jojobera, Jharkhand and Karnataka.

Panel.html:p: We welcome you to this forum where you can share your opinion, unresolved complaint, query and feedback directly with our seniorleaders, steering this special channel. The senior leaders who are a part of this forum are:

html:div.html:p: Our endeavor is to deliver “uninterrupted power supply” to all the customers.It will be heartening to know your experiences or suggestions to help us get better. Please feel free to provide us your valuable feedback or suggestions. We are committed to serving our customers to the best of our ability.
COO & Executive Director

I acknowledge that you have a choice of a service provider.I can assure you that we are committed to serving our customers seamlessly.However, in case your experience is otherwise or you have suggestion for us to serve you better, kindly write to me, directly. I will always cherish your feedback, suggestion or inputs for improvements. Please accept my thanks and gratitude for visiting our web-link and spending your valuable time in engaging with us.
CEO & Managing Director

Panel.html:p: Please feel free to write to them. We are committed to address all your concerns to your fullest
satisfaction and put your feedback into action.

html:div.html:p: (For Tata Power Residential Consumers Only)

As you might be aware, we had rolled out the 5 Star DSM Energy Efficient Ceiling Fan Program earlier. It received an overwhelming response from our consumers. Keeping pace with the advanced technology, we have upgraded our ceiling fan program to the DSM Super-Efficient Ceiling Fan Program. This is the first DSM Super-Efficient Ceiling Fan program in India.

Based on the BLDC Motor technology, the Ceiling Fans offered under this program are more energy efficient than 5 Star Ceiling Fans, thus helping you save more energy and money. Apart from that, these fans come with multiple user-friendly features (e.g. A Smart Remote that has speed control, sleep and timer mode) to enhance your operational convenience. Thus, these products offer an enjoyable, smart and energy-saving ceiling fan experience. Read on to know more about the product offered under this program.

html:div.html:h5: Salient Features of Super-Efficient (BLDC Technology Based) Ceiling Fan

html:ul.html:li: Consumes only 28 W at the highest speed (about 1/3rd of an ordinary fan)
Highest Service value (Air Delivery/ Watt)
Humming Noise-free Working
Greater Operational Control through Remote
Brush Less Direct Current Technology is the latest revolution in the fan industry (the way LED technology is for the lighting).
Use of the BLDC Motor is the most innovative feature of these ceiling fans.
Permanent magnets used in rotor are responsible for mass reduction in power consumption compared to windings used in the stator in an ordinary induction fan.
BLDC Motor making the motor more rugged for long-term use.
Life of a BLDC fan is also expected to be much higher than ordinary fans.
Automatically stops after the programmed hour.
Use this feature when you don't need fan after 1, 2, 3, 6 or 9 hours.
Saves energy, increases comfort level.
Fans speed keep on reducing gradually.
During the night increase your comfort level by switching to this mode.
Saves energy smartly.

html:div.html:h5: Convenience offered by the Smart Remote

html:div.html:p: Apart from the regular speed control, you can use the Remote to control the fan operations by using sleep and timer mode.
All in all, these Super-efficient ceiling fans combine the extra energy savings along with comfortable and convenience ceiling fan experience.
We look forward to your participation in the Super-Efficient Ceiling Fan Program.
To know more about the program and register for the same, please provide your consumer number below:

html:div.html:h5: LED Tube Light New Purchase Programme

html:div.html:p: (For Tata Power Residential and Industrial/Commercial Consumers)
Dear Consumer,
This Program is closed.
If any query, Please write to dsmcell@tatapower.com

html:div.html:h4: Energy Efficient Refrigerator New Purchase & Exchange Programme

html:div.html:h5: Energy Efficient Refrigerator New Purchase & Exchange Programme

html:div.html:p: (For Tata Power Residential Consumers only)

Refrigerator is the important but highly underrated appliance in residential energy consumption. By virtue of its almost continuous operation throughout the year, it offers a great opportunity to save energy. Under our DSM initiative, we had rolled out the Energy Efficient Refrigerator Program earlier. Buoyed by the tremendous response that we received, we have launched the next phase of the program.

BEE 5 Star rated refrigerators are made available up to a handsome discount of 40% on MRP. The new program offers a wide range of consumer-friendly features like latest models, choice to visit the store or doorstep delivery and option of extended warranty. Program has also been extended to include the new purchase option. So be energy savvy, participate in the program and avail the benefit of this special offer.
Read on to know more about the program and registration:
(For Tata Power Residential and Industrial/Commercial Consumers)
Dear Consumer,

Thank you for your interest in our 5-Star Split AC Exchange Program. We have received an overwhelming response for it. As the full approved quantity is booked by consumers, the new registration of this program is closed now. Please keep watching this space for further announcement.
Please write to dsmcell@tatapower.com for any queries.

html:div.html:div:
Energy Audit Programme
Enerdy Audit Programme
(For Commercial and Industrial Customers only)
Now you get to save money where it counts the most! Opt for our Energy Audit programme that helps you identify energy saving opportunities at your own premises.
Every facility is unique in nature of operation and energy consumption. And only an energy audit specialist can identify inefficiencies in your equipments and provide you with customized recommendations for achieving energy savings.
Specialist Energy Audit Firms (approved by BEE) will conduct energy audit of your premises only at 25% cost!\
So, take the first step in controlling your energy consumption. Register for our Energy Audit Programme at discounted rates and track those energy guzzlers today!
Yes, I am a Tata Power Commercial/Industrial Customer. I am interested to carry out energy audit in my premises under Tata Power programme. Please send me the details of your programme.

html:ul.html:li: 190 Economies around the world are ranked by the World Bank on ten parameters wherein, ‘Getting Electricity’ is also one of the parameters.

Some of the parameters considered in evaluating ‘Getting Electricity’ for an electricity connection which impact a 140KW / 150 KVA connection on 415V supply are as follows:
Time taken to get electricity connection.
Cost required for getting a new connection.
Procedure required to be completed for getting new connection.
Reliability of Electricity supply.

The concerted efforts of Ministry of Power, Central Electricity Authority, Government of Maharashtra and the DISCOMS in Delhi and Mumbai, have contributed in raising India’s rank in ‘Getting Electricity’ from 137th rank in 2015 to 26th rank in 2017 (Fig(i)).
Many reforms have been undertaken to improve the rankings
Installation of transformers on Pole Mounted Substations up to 500KVA, earlier the provision is only for 250 KVA transformers.
Electrical Inspection Clearance Authority given to DISCOM for installations up to 11 KV.
Normative Service Connection Charges.
Energization within 15 days for new electricity connections requests received through online mode.
Number of documents required for obtaining a new electricity connections reduced to 2 nos. along with application form.

Online facility provided to the consumer for
Registration of New Electricity Connections.
Uploading of Documents.
Payments of Estimate Charges.
Procedure for obtaining a New Connection have been reduced to 3:

Implementation of Outage Management System, and Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition system (SCADA) for improved reliability. Tata Power Reliability Indices for FY 17 are as follows:
SAIFI
SAIDI
Status tracking against Notifications
